entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
